text: The Acquittal is a 1923 American mystery movie directed by Clarence Brown and was based on the play of the same name by Rita Weiman. It stars Claire Windsor, Norman Kerry, Richard Travers, Barbara Bedford, Charles Wellesley, Frederick Vroom and was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1923 movies Category:1920s mystery movies Category:American mystery movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Clarence Brown
title: The Acquittal
